::DrillBit::

He noded to KitKat, and watched her walk off. He turned to Cyber Claw,
with a big smile.
"Well, how about that tour? We could go by the bridge, then to
Enginieering, then to the MessHall, and finish with a walk around the
officer quorters. What do ya say?"
